**The Supreme Clarity Cavern-Real Heavenly Treasure Great Cavern Three Radiance Precious Register**

**Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Cavern-Real Heavenly Treasure Great Cavern Three Radiance Precious Register*
**Author:** Unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties or the Sui-Tang period. Compiled from four early Supreme Clarity School registers: *The Most High Golden Tiger Talisman Register*, *The Most High Flying Steps of the Empty Constant Register*, *The Most High Two Radiance Three Swift Registers*, and *The Most High Mysterious Register of Tortoise Mountain*. Two scrolls in total.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

---

### *The Supreme Clarity Cavern-Real Heavenly Treasure Great Cavern Three Radiance Precious Register*, Scroll One

#### **The Most High Lord Emperor’s Golden Tiger Talisman Register**
**Jade Clarity Rank, First Grade**

On the day of [X] in the month of [X] in the year of [X] of the Great Era, [X] of [X] prefecture, [X] county, [X] village, [male/female disciple], named [X], aged [X] years, born on the [X] day of the [X] month at the [X] hour, now presents offerings and sincerity to the Master of the Three Caverns, [X], to receive *The Most High Lord Emperor’s Golden Tiger Talisman Register*. After receiving and wearing it, one must uphold and cultivate it in accordance with the precepts, never lightly disclosing or defiling its sacred writ. Should one violate this, they shall bear divine punishment, unredeemed for ten thousand kalpas. If cultivated in accordance with the Dao, one shall attain immortality in both life and death, as bound by the covenant and statutes.

The **True Talisman of the Golden Tiger and Jade Essence of the Celestial Emperor of the Great Tenuity** is the innate golden scripture of the Supreme Primordial’s Upper Radiance. It commands golden immortals, seals mountains, summons spirits, overawes the Six Heavens, and annihilates the myriad demons. The Most High ever deploys the Four Numinous Beasts, the Six Jia Spirits, and seven hundred thousand attendants to guard this talisman within the Jade Palace of the Great Tenuity. Those who wear this talisman shall wield authority over Heaven and Earth, rebuke the host of spirits, command radiant dragons, and hold office among the exalted immortals. Once its jade resonance is activated, jade blossoms shall attend at one’s side, golden perfected ones shall guard as soldiers, a thousand demons shall lose their courage, ten thousand ghosts shall vanish in form, the Nine Demons shall bow their heads, the Six Heavens shall crumble, the Dao’s wonders shall reach the ultimate truth, and the spirits shall gather the Five Numinous Powers. To the left, the Dark Lad shall howl; to the right, the Golden Dawn shall be subdued. How great is this precious writ, the true majesty of the Supreme Emperor! It is not merely for dispelling poisons, repelling trials, and extinguishing demons—it is the mark of attaining the wondrous ranks of immortality and realizing the true Dao.

Twenty-seven **Jade Maidens of the Script** shall attend and protect the body of the one who upholds the scriptures. Those who revere the talisman and honor the precepts shall ascend to the Three Clarities’ Palaces. Should one violate or profane it, or transmit it to the unworthy, their body shall enter the winds and fires, unredeemed for eternal kalpas.

The talisman is inscribed in cinnabar on white silk and worn upon the head. Additionally, a belt of orpiment and azure is tied at the right side of the waist. All is in accordance with the covenant and statutes of the Most High.

All talismans within this scroll are inscribed in cinnabar.

The **Supreme Prime Upper Radiance Golden Elixir True Talisman** holds inner invocations of awe-inspiring spirit, summoning divine soldiers to sever and extinguish wayward souls. One must enter the chamber, burn incense, and strike the teeth thirty-six times. Whether sitting or lying, recite the invocation:

*"Expel the Qian Toxin King! Raise the fluttering banner of Luo! The Eight Immortals grasp their halberds! The Five Numinous Ones of the Supreme Emperor! The Supreme Mystery descends in radiance! The Seven Mornings guard the courtyard! The Yellow Perfected shines with talismanic brilliance! Flames and bells cast forth! Divine tigers brandish their might! Poisoned blades clash in chaos! The purple majesty of the script unfurls! The Four Quaking Ones roar to the heavens! The Four Heavens stand towering! Know the names of ghosts, and the outer realm shall tread in the mysterious qi! Guard within with the master’s soldiers! Left, wield awe; right, turn to survey! Wind strikes, fire conquers! Shout and sever ten thousand demons! Crush and behead a thousand spirits! The Golden Perfected rouses its might! The Nine Demons submit their forms! The Northern Feng crumbles and falls! All that is destroyed shall be overthrown!"*

*"I wear the true talisman and command the ten thousand spirits. The Three Primes report to the true, the mysterious aligns with the Emperor’s sincerity. The Supreme Micro Emperor ascends to the Three Clarities."*

The method of the **Supreme Prime Upper Radiance’s** awe-inspiring inner invocation belongs to the esoteric scriptures of the **Highest Clarity**. The *"Qian Toxin King"* is the hidden name of the great demon within the Six Heavens. The *"fluttering banner of Luo"* is the concealed title of the Demon King of the Northern Emperor. The *"towering Four Heavens"* are the soul-names of the ghostly ministers of the Northern Feng. One who knows the names of these three ghosts shall cause a thousand demons to flee without trace, ten thousand ghosts to conceal their forms, the Nine Demons to be powerless to test, and a hundred evils to be unable to inflict harm. Whether dwelling alone in mountains and forests or amidst the spirits of palaces and temples, one may proceed with confidence, without need to burn incense or enter the chamber. If fasting and entering the chamber, or at the morning and evening audiences of the Eight Primes, to subdue demons, summon spirits, and command divine perfected ones, one may wear the talisman and proceed.

---

The **Supreme Lord’s Divine Tiger Talisman**
The **Lord of the Supreme Micro Heavenly Emperor** addressed the **Upper Minister Azure Youth** and the **Queen Mother of the Western Citadel**, saying: *"The* **Highest Clarity Wisdom Scripture for Dispelling Demons** *is the jade tablet of the Supreme Ultimate, the true formula of the Most High. The* **Divine Tiger True Talisman** *is the treasured chapter of the Great Perfected Ones of the Nine Heavens. Wisdom can dispel filth, dispelling demons can restrain evil, and the true talisman can subdue demons and extinguish demons. Those who possess jade tablets with purple names and cultivate the supreme method shall not be assailed by the myriad demons or tested by the ten thousand demons. This may be called: no harm can intrude upon the divine might of the Divine Tiger, the wondrous efficacy of the true scripture. Now I entrust this to you, to transmit to later students who are destined to become true persons. Follow the statutes of the Supreme Perfected Ones: within seven hundred years, permit three transmissions. Do not show it to the unworthy, nor carelessly reveal the true scripture, lest one incur the punishment of the wind-blade."*

*"Those who delight in the true Dao, diligently focus their minds on the mysterious, do not begrudge wealth, and value the method above material goods—such is the Dao that abides within. Only to such persons may this be spoken. Those who inwardly covet treasures and outwardly indulge in frivolous desires—the Dao, though already illuminated, shall be sealed within a jade coffer, locked with a golden gate. After ascending and attaining transcendence, it shall be concealed within a famous mountain."*

---

The **Jade Capital of the Supreme Lord, the Nine Heavens’ Golden Clouds’ Awe-Inspiring Jade Invocation**, the **Supreme Prime Scripture of the Supreme Divine Tiger Talisman**.

The **large characters of the Divine Tiger** and the **invocation for wielding spirits** are stored by the Supreme Lord in the chamber of the **Primordial Beginning**, not transmitted to the world. Only those who are **supreme perfected ones** may behold them. According to the statutes of the **Supreme Ultimate’s esoteric methods**, on the day of ascension, one may transmit it to a single person; beyond that time, it may not be revealed again. The rites of transmission follow the preceding method.

Furthermore, when transmitting the scripture, the disciple shall hand-copy one copy for the master. After one hundred days, the master shall cast it into the eastern flowing waters, ensuring no one sees. This scripture is called *"Transcending the Human Dao"* and is a solemn covenant with the Three Officials.

---

**Oral Formula and Invocation Method for the Supreme Lord’s Divine Tiger Great Talisman**
When receiving the oral formula of the **Supreme Lord’s Jade Spirit Divine Tiger Great Talisman**, after completing the covenant and reception, the disciple shall cross their hands and draw a single line to present to the master. One hundred days after receiving the scripture, the master shall purify themselves for three days. The text drawn by the disciple, along with the covenant oaths and invocations, shall be sealed with an iron seal and cast into the deep waters of the Eastern Sea. Then, facing the heavens, recite the invocation:

*"Supreme true talisman, Jade Spirit Divine Tiger! The receiver’s name is inscribed in the immortal register, erasing punishments and trials. They shall surely attain perfection and disperse all sorrows and sufferings. Do not divulge this! Ten thousand ages pass in an instant. Solemnly covenant with the Water Official, swiftly swear to the Earth Deity."*

After the invocation, return directly without looking back. This is called *"completing the covenant."* It is the beginning of having one’s name recorded in the register of the **Upper Official of the Three Officials**.

If, after receiving it, one does not act accordingly, they shall never be permitted to wear the **Divine Tiger Scripture** nor have their name inscribed in the **Highest Clarity**. After three years, their body shall perish, and they shall endure the long trials of the Water Official.

After the solemn covenant, on the **wu-shen** day of the **fourth month of each season**, use cinnabar to draw the talisman on white silk, making it three feet and two inches in length. Write the characters *"white king"* (bai wang), strike the teeth seven times, and recite the invocation:

*"The spirit of the Supreme Divine Tiger gathers qi into the purple script, containing the radiance of jade essence. Its might subdues fierce demons, restrains the ten thousand spirits. Divine youths attend and guard, Jade Maidens support the form. I wear this scripture and command golden soldiers, becoming a king of immortals, flying and ascending to the Highest Clarity."*

After reciting, strike the teeth seven more times and swallow saliva three times. On that day, use a **purple damask pouch** and a **white brocade pouch** to contain it and wear it on the body.

According to the statutes of the **Four Poles**, this talisman is weighty and may not be exposed to the world of mortals. Only those who already possess an **immortal name and jade tablet** may hear and see it. On the day of receiving the talisman, always inscribe it in cinnabar on white silk, rolling it to a size of one’s choosing and placing it in the pouch. If it has not been soiled or defiled, it may be worn on the body. In all matters, maintain secrecy, do not mix it with other scriptures, nor reveal its title.

Beware, for this is forbidden by the Great Ultimate—take heed! The primordial celestial talisman, the divine *qi*, the essence and radiance of the Most Supreme, coalesces into the **Seven-Headed Spirit Tiger of Vital *Qi***, ever attendant to guard the body, subdue and extinguish demonic forces, and dispel misfortune. The tiger’s retinue must never speak to others, saying, “I possess a celestial talisman,” nor disclose the title of this scripture. Should one speak to one person, one tiger departs; to two, two tigers leave; to three, three depart—until all seven tigers have gone, and the body is left without its guardian hosts. Then, malevolent spirits, demonic ghosts, the **Three Officials**, and the **Northern Emperor** will all come to test and assail. If one has not yet attained immortality, keep this deeply secret. By the statutes of the **Four Pacts**, take utmost care—take heed, take heed!

**Sponsor, Supervisor, Preceptor, and the Register of Soaring Steps in the Void of Perpetuity**—Second Rank of the Jade Clarity Department.

On the day of [year], in the reign of [Tai Sui], the [month] and [day], [hour], [so-and-so] of [prefecture, commandery, county, village], male/female, named [personal name], aged [years], born on the [month, day, hour], now presents offerings and tokens to the **Master of the Three Caverns**, [so-and-so], to request and receive the *Register of Soaring Steps in the Void of Perpetuity*. I vow to uphold and cultivate it without敢轻泄 or exposing its true text. Should I once violate these statutes, I shall bear the consequences of divine judgment, unforgiven for ten thousand kalpas. If received and maintained according to the proper method, I shall attain immortality in both life and death—all in accordance with the covenant and its decrees.

The **Most High Lord of the Great Dao** states: The Void and Perpetuity are the *hun* and *po* of Heaven and Earth, the majestic brilliance of *yin* and *yang*. The Void is the essence and spirit of the Nine Heavens, while Perpetuity is the numinous soul of the Nine Earths. The two *qi* converge at the center of the Dipper, forming the great deity of the Supreme Emperor, whose radiance aids and illuminates the cosmos. They regard the assisting deities as their gaze, dispatching the celestial light to survey all directions, recording the constellations of Heaven, revolving the Five Constants, summoning and gathering transformations, hastening the mechanisms of the divine. When Heaven is at peace and Earth is prosperous, the Void and Perpetuity remain concealed; when Heaven is in turmoil and Earth is disturbed, they shine forth in clarity. Fortune and misfortune, omens and warnings—all are instantly reported. They transform the myriad *qi*, alter *yin* and *yang*, and govern the succession of the four seasons—none occurs without their agency. The two stars are most revered, hidden within the splendor of dawn. Those who behold them gain boundless longevity; those who cultivate their Way ascend to the Highest Clarity. Only those whose names are inscribed in the **Jade Register of the Mysterious Chart** may lawfully behold this text. Practitioners shall perform this ritual seven times a month. On the days of the **Six Ding** and the **Eight Festivals**, one may enter the chamber, burn incense, and arrange the diagram and mat to the left and right. Facing south, strike the teeth twenty-four times, close the eyes, and visualize the Five Stars entering the five palaces of the viscera, their light penetrating the entire body until warmth is felt. Next, meditate upon the **Royal Ladies of the Five Stars** and the **Twenty-Five Luminaries of the Void and Perpetuity**, recalling their names, taboo names, and attire according to their respective directions. When all is complete, recite the secret invocation:

*"Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, Earth—governing the Four Origins,
Mysterious clarity flows and reflects, illuminating the Five Gates.
Within reside the Spirit Lords of the Five Stars and their Ladies,
The Twenty-Five Luminaries of the Void and Perpetuity, Most Exalted,
Transforming their forms and radiance, uniting ten thousand divisions.
Descend into the Five Viscera, coalescing into Jade Immortals,
Refining my seven *po*, nurturing my three *hun*,
Lifting my form to ascend, soaring into the Dipper’s Gate,
Roaming the Upper Capital, the Five Stars in assembly.
Today, I invoke this mysterious blessing—grant what I have recited."*

Afterward, draw in the light of the Five Stars and swallow twenty-five times. Then take seven steps, bring the feet together, and stand upon the **Star of Venus**. Hold the breath for seven breaths, facing west, and recite:

*"The Seven Gates of the West, white *qi* flying in radiance,
Above dwells the Luminous Emperor of Lesser *Yin*, the August Brilliance,
Whose taboo name is ‘Metal’s Supreme Essence,’
Clad in feathered robes, resplendent hues flowing,
Glowing bright in the Golden Palace,
Called the Five Luminaries, the lineage of the Void and Perpetuity.
Bearing talismans and wielding staffs, they summon *yin* and command *yang*,
Transforming water and fire across seventy-four directions.
Grant me the power to soar in flight, concealing my radiance in the Void,
Riding the white chariot, roaming the cloud chambers,
To enjoy eternal years, boundless and infinite."*

After reciting, swallow seven breaths while looking upward. Then take twelve steps, bring the feet together, and stand upon the **Star of Saturn**. Hold the breath for twelve breaths, facing southwest, and recite:

*"The Four *Qi* of the Central August, overseeing the Eight Numinous,
Within the Jade Terrace and Purple Chamber, divine luminaries transform and arise.
There dwells the Primordial August One, the Five Constants’ hidden name,
Who daily treads the Gate of Perpetuity, pacifying the Yellow Court.
Clad in robes of flying clouds, crowned with the essence of splendor,
Holding talismans and wielding staffs, adorned with fiery bells,
Grant me the power to soar in flight, reveal my divine name,
Descend into my spleen and viscera, pacify my spirit and essence,
Ascend to Heaven and enter the clouds, conceal my radiance and transform my form,
Hide and alter the myriad things, roam the Jade Clarity,
To dwell with the August Lord, together guarding the Great Brilliance."*

After reciting, swallow twelve breaths while looking upward. Then take three steps, stand upon the **Star of Mars**, face south, hold the breath for three breaths, and recite:

*"The Three Gates ablaze with radiance, cinnabar light flowing in essence,
Mysterious *qi* surging, glowing bright in the Southern Abyss.
Above dwells the Crimson August One, the luminous spirit of the Five Emperors,
Whose taboo name is ‘Wandering Radiance,’
Clad in brocade and patterned essence,
Crowned with a treasure diadem, girded with jade bells,
Moving in and out of the Vermilion Palace, the Purple Chamber and Crimson Walls.
Record and protect my life, inscribe my birth in the Southern Palace,
Grant me the power to soar in flight, transform my *qi* and conceal my form.
On auspicious days, practice the Way—may all under Heaven be purified.
My heart-spirit coalesces into truth, my five *hun* shine with clarity,
Aligned with the Three *Qi*, merging with the radiance of the Fire Star."*

After reciting, swallow three breaths while looking upward. Then take nine steps, stand upon the **Star of Jupiter**, face east, hold the breath for nine breaths, and recite:

*"The Nine *Qi* of the East, the Jade Gate of the Azure Heavens,
Within dwells the Azure Dawn, the Lord of the Mysterious Supreme,
Whose flowing essence surges—this is the celestial *hun*.
Whose taboo name is ‘Great Brightness,’ exalted above Heaven and Earth,
Clad in phoenix robes and striped tiger skirts,
Transforming into Five Luminaries, shifting forms across the Nine Capitals.
Crowned with the essence of azure, wearing the Jade Diadem of the Heavens,
Bearing golden talismans and feathered staffs, tinkling bells in abundance,
Holding the Hidden Script, soaring in flight with feathered texts.
Record my life, guard my Liver Gate,
Externally radiant, internally luminous—my liver stores the immortal.
Welcome my ascent, to ascend and pay homage to the Imperial Dawn."*

Upon completion, draw in the starlight and swallow nine times to conclude.

Next, take five steps onto the Wood Star, face north, hold the breath for five cycles, and recite:

*"The Five *Qi* of the North, the Mysterious Gate of the Profound,
The Northern Asterism flows in radiance, the Supreme Jade Clarity of the *Kui* Constellation,
Within dwells the Grand Sovereign, the Five Emperors’ exalted names,
Whose taboo name is ‘Primal Yin Elixir,’
Clad in robes of darkest azure, crowned with the Jade Diadem,
Girded with belts of tinkling bells,
Bearing golden talismans and jade staffs, jade pendants gleaming bright,
Wandering the resplendent dawn, gazing beside the Eight Obscurities,
Descending in revolving streams to enter my Kidney Court,
Preserving and recording the Five Spirits, my viscera flourishing in brilliance,
Internally and externally replete, transforming my radiance and altering my form,
My bones take flight, my flesh ascends—
I ascend to the Jade Clarity."*

Upon completion, draw in the starlight and swallow five times to conclude.

After pacing the Five Stars, retreat seven steps from the Water Star, ascend to the Metal Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Nine Constants:

*"Nine Constants, Earth Lords, transform the shadows of the hidden depths,
Conceal my steps for me, that I may escape my form."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the Nurturing Constant, and recite:

*"Nurturing Constant, Spirit Lord, whose form knows no fixed attire,
Transform me, that my body may become grass or wood."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the *Mao* Constant, and recite:

*"*Mao* Constant, Exalted Spirit, who sinks and rises,
Transform my body into radiance, alter me into hills and mounds."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Flowing Constant, and recite:

*"Flowing Constant, August Lord, whose form knows no permanence,
For me, exhale and inhale, stir the *qi* and raise the mist."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the Moving Constant, and recite:

*"Moving Constant, Great Lord, whose might subdues the myriad ghosts,
Transform my form, raise mist to become flame."*

Upon completion of the Five Constants’ invocations, return to the Metal Star, hold the breath for seven cycles, and recite:

*"Soaring through the Great Obscurity, transforming radiance into Five Constants,
Entering the Five *Qi* of the North, subduing the Three Yangs of the South,
Golden talismans command the spirits, the Supreme Emperor lends his aid,
The Six *Wu* escape the Six *Ji*, preserving passage through the Cavern Realms,
The Great White guards the lungs, metal stabilizes the stomach and intestines,
Internally replete, externally overflowing, form and *hun* take flight together,
A thousand transformations, ten thousand changes—wherever my will directs,
I attain union with the Jade Emperor, roaming the Supreme Radiance."*

Upon completion, draw in the *qi* and swallow seven times to conclude.

Next, from the Metal Star, take twelve steps to ascend the Earth Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Upper Constants:

*"Upper Constant, soaring and circling, transforming in countless millions,
Conceal my radiance for me, that I may ascend into the Nine Heavens."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the Heavenly Constant, and recite:

*"Heavenly Constant, flowing flames, raising mist to form ramparts,
Transform my form for me, gird my spirit and enter the fire."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the Named Constant, and recite:

*"Named Constant of the Northern Mystery, whose body is water,
Hide me in rivers and seas, bathe me to perfection."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Three Constants, and recite:

*"Three Constants, transforming might, illuminating the Eight Courts,
For me, attain immortality, repel disasters and ward off weapons."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the *Chen* Constant, and recite:

*"*Chen* Constant of ten thousand transformations, whose body knows no fixed form,
For me, attain immortality, escape death and enter life."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Earth Star, hold the breath for twelve cycles, and recite:

*"The Five Yellows without constancy, the Central August Great Spirit,
Transform the *qi* of the Seven Metals, whose might subdues the Three Luminaries,
My body divides into forms, ascending to heaven and entering the clouds,
Summoning the Five Spirits in unison to guard my Spleen Gate,
That my viscera may swiftly transform into immortality,
Soaring through the Constants into the void, traversing water and fire across the myriad origins,
Wherever my will directs, ascending without barrier,
I attain union with the Jade Consort, befriending the host of immortals."*

Upon completion, draw in the *qi* and swallow twelve times to conclude.

Next, from the Earth Star, take three steps to ascend the Fire Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Void Constants:

*"Void Constant, most numinous, assisting the Supreme Perfected,
Enter my Crimson Palace, gathering and governing the myriad spirits."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the River Constant, and recite:

*"River Constant, presaging submission, concealed in the Eight Obscurities,
Transforming through water and fire, that I may attain immortality."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the Primordial Constant, and recite:

*"Primordial Constant, transforming and altering, concealing my body in grass and trees,
That my form and radiance may unite with the true Dao."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Ancient Constant, and recite:

*"Ancient Constant of Heaven’s Pair, entering and exiting without hindrance,
My body sprouts feathered wings, soaring to ascend the heavens."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the *Si* Constant, and recite:

*"*Si* Constant of the Southern *Li*, standing amidst the Nine Overturnings,
Transform my form, that I may instantly become bird or beast."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Fire Star, hold the breath for three cycles, and recite:

*"Flowing flames and cinnabar spirits, lightning and thunder at the Three Gates,
The Five Constants interpenetrate and transform, the myriad changes shrouded in obscurity,
Seizing the life-record of the Jade Emperor, whose might subdues the Northern Essence,
The Upper Register of Immortals preserves my longevity,
Today I pace the void, riding emptiness to enter the stars,
The Sparkling Deluder aids my heart, my Dao shines in unison,
A thousand divisions, ten thousand unions—wherever I direct, instant attainment,
My *hun* guides, my *po* is refined, feathered robes timely manifest,
I attain union with the Five Stars, riding in company to the Jade Clarity."*

Upon completion, swallow three cycles of *qi* to conclude.

Next, from the Fire Star, take nine steps to ascend the Wood Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Nine Constants:

*"Nine Constants, Azure Sovereign, root of the *hun* of heaven and earth,
Transform me, that I may escape my radiance and conceal myself in the mountains."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the Worldly Constant, and recite:

*"Worldly Constant, Heavenly Spirit, universally delivering the myriad immortals,
That I may pace the void, uniting my radiance to become a spirit."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the Luminous Constant, and recite:

*"Luminous Constant, shining and resplendent, illuminating the Eight Streams,
Transform my form, that I may escape water and conceal myself in the sources."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Jade Constant, and recite:

*"Jade Constant, mighty in transformation, subduing the Five Lands,
Transform my form, that I may instantly stand and become a tiger."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the Dharma Constant, and recite:

*"Dharma Constant, overseeing the woods, whose position governs the immortals,
Divide my radiance for me, that my body may transform into a thousand."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Wood Star, hold the breath for nine cycles, and recite:

*"Lesser Yang of the Nine Gates, wandering the Azure Heavens,
Within dwell the Five Constants, transforming in countless millions,
Summoning yin and calling yang, subduing the Metal Spirit,
The Eastern Florescence commands the tally, seated in accord with spontaneity,
Pacing the void, treading emptiness, spurring the chariot of azure mist,
Above, stabilizing the Azure Void; below, stabilizing the Liver Gate,
The Dao illuminates the Nine Unions, instantly attaining flight as an immortal,
I attain union with the Azure Sovereign, uniting with the true Wood Dawn."*

Upon completion, draw qi and swallow it nine times, then cease.

Next, take five steps from the Wood Star to reach the Water Star, join the feet, and ascend the first Yin Constant, reciting:

*"Yin Constant of the Northern Mystery, origin of the myriad transformations,
Grant that I abide here and instantly become a divine dragon."*

Upon completion, ascend the second Yellow Constant, reciting:

*"Yellow Constant of numinous yin, transforming into a woman,
Grant that my form divide and I become a hundred selves."*

Upon completion, ascend the third Stabilizing Constant, reciting:

*"Stabilizing Constant of total numen, teeming with transformations,
Grant that my form divide and I become the myriad things."*

Upon completion, ascend the fourth Flying Constant, reciting:

*"Flying Constant entering emptiness, a hundred transformations above and below,
Shifting form into the six livestock, rendering one unseen."*

Upon completion, ascend the fifth and sixth Constants, reciting:

*"Sixth Constant of the rigid sword, subduing ghosts and commanding spirits,
Revolving heaven and earth, slaying those who oppose it."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Water Star, hold the breath for five cycles, and recite:

*"Northern Mystery of the Five Qi, the Five Gates open wide,
Named the Five Thearchs, transforming the hidden and obscure,
Emerging from yin and entering yang, subduing the Earth Officials,
Grant that I pace in flight, escaping radiance in the Great Void,
Wherever I turn, dividing my form into a hundred thousand,
Ascending to the Sentence Array, rising to Jade Capital,
My body sprouting wondrous fur, my Kidney Palace receiving fragrance,
Today in practicing the Dao, I follow the ancestral lineage of immortals,
Attaining the celestial vow, enjoying boundless blessings."*

Upon completion, swallow the five qi and cease.

The twenty-five cycles of pacing the Void Constants conclude.

Next, take nine steps, swallow qi five times, ascend the first star of the Northern Dipper, join the feet, and ascend Yang Brightness, facing east to recite:

*"Supreme Central Palace, concealing and escaping the primordial,
The Great Goddess of the Inner Consort, the Most Honored of the Great One,
Governing the essence of destiny, bestowing immortality upon me,
Hiding my form and escaping my self, ascending to the Imperial Chariot."*

Upon completion, ascend the second star, facing northeast to recite:

*"Within the Central Origin Palace, preserving the embryo and transforming form,
The Great Perfected of the Inner Concubine, the Most Exalted and Mysterious Numen,
Severing the placenta and untying knots, refining the embryo and securing essence,
Transforming in myriad ways, granting me long life."*

Upon completion, ascend the Star of Assistance, facing the Perfected to recite:

*"Within the Palace of True Origin, the six evasions and seven concealments,
The Primordial Mother of the Upper Origin, nurturing my embryonic birth,

chunks.original_text: 太元上景金丹真符，威神内祝，以召神兵斩灭邪魂。 当入室烧香，叩齿三十六通，坐卧任意，乃祝曰： 辟乾毒王，振拾罗旌，八仙秉钺，上帝五灵，太玄落景，七晨卫庭，黄真曜符，焕掷火铃，神虎奋豪，毒锋乱呈，紫勃文仪，四躩仰鸣，四天磊磊，能知鬼名，外躔玄气，内守师兵，左威右顾，风伐火征，叱斩万祆，摧馘千精，金真振威，九魔摄形，北酆摧落，所灭皆倾。 我佩真符，役使万灵，三元告真，玄合帝诚，太微上帝，上升三清。 太元上景威神内祝之法，皆上清之禁经也。 辟乾毒王者，是六天大鬼之内名也。 振拾罗旌者，是北帝魔王之隐讳也。 四天磊磊者，是北酆鬼相之魂名也。 能知三鬼名者，则千祆窜迹，万鬼匿形，九魔莫得而动试，百邪弗得而陈害，山林独处，及在府庙鬼神之中，便可按而行事，不必烧香入室。 若斋入室，朝宴八元，并制魔召灵，驱策神真者，便佩而行事也。 太上神虎符 太微天帝君告上相青童君、西城王母曰：《上清智慧文消魔真经》，此太极之玉篇，高上之真诀，神虎真符，九天太真所宝章。 智慧可以逐秽，消魔可以束邪，真符可以制魔灭祆。 夫有玉简紫名，得修上法者，不为众祆所乘，万魔所试也。 可谓万害不能干，神虎之灵威，真经之妙用也。 今以相付，可传后学应为真人者。 当依太真之科，七百年内听行三传。 不得示非人，轻露真文，身被风刀之考矣。 夫好乐道真，勤心注玄，无吝财物，轻财贵法，道无不存。 如此之士，始可与言。 内爱财宝，外心浮好，道亦已照，闭之玉笈，加以金阙，升度之后，藏之名山矣。 右太上玉京九天金霄威神玉祝，太上元经太神虎符。 右神虎大字及挥神之祝，太上藏之於元始之室，不传於世，若有上真之人，乃得见此耳。 按太极禁法之科，临升之日，听传一人，过期不得复出。 传授之仪，一如上法。 又上文之时，弟子当手书一通与师，百日之后，师沈於东流水中，勿令人见。 此文名为越度人道，重盟三官之约。 太上行神虎大符口诀祝法 凡受太上玉精神虎大符之诀，练盟受之都毕，弟子叉手画一道以与〔师〕#1，受经之后足一百日，师乃清斋三日，以弟子所画之文，并盟誓祝说，皆令其画封以铁检，沉於东海深水之时，乃仰天而祝曰： 太上真符，玉精神虎，受者刻名仙簿，消减刑考，必令成真，散除忧苦。 勿得宣漏，万龄一瞬，谨盟水官，速誓后土。 祝毕径还，慎勿反顾，此名为毕盟。 三官上官上名仙箓之始。 世若受之后不为此者，则终身不得佩带神虎文，不得刻名上清也。 三年之后，身亦将亡，长考水官。 重盟之后，当以四季之月，戊申之日，以朱笔画文於素上，令长三尺二寸，书法白王，叩齿七通，祝曰： 太上神虎之灵，结气紫文，含曜玉精，威伏强魔，制御万灵，神童侍卫，玉女扶形，我佩此文，役使金兵，得为仙王，飞升上清。 毕，又叩齿七通，咽液三过。 当以其日，用紫绫囊、素锦囊盛之，以佩身也。 按四极之科，此符重，不得於地上人间，旧有仙名玉挺，乃得闻见之耳。 受符之日，皆当朱书白缯，卷辟大小随意，盛於囊中，不经淹浊者，当可佩於形。 每事唯令隐密，不得与他经相杂，及宣昭篇目。

The **Supreme Prime Upper Radiance Golden Elixir True Talisman** holds inner invocations of awe-inspiring spirit, summoning divine soldiers to sever and extinguish wayward souls. One must enter the chamber, burn incense, and strike the teeth thirty-six times. Whether sitting or lying, recite the invocation:

*"Expel the Qian Toxin King! Raise the fluttering banner of Luo! The Eight Immortals grasp their halberds! The Five Numinous Ones of the Supreme Emperor! The Supreme Mystery descends in radiance! The Seven Mornings guard the courtyard! The Yellow Perfected shines with talismanic brilliance! Flames and bells cast forth! Divine tigers brandish their might! Poisoned blades clash in chaos! Guard within with the master’s soldiers! Left, wield awe; right, turn to survey! Wind strikes, fire conquers! Shout and sever ten thousand demons! Crush and behead a thousand spirits! The Golden Perfected rouses its might! The Nine Demons submit their forms! The Northern Feng crumbles and falls! All that is destroyed shall be overthrown!"*

*"I wear the true talisman and command the ten thousand spirits. The Three Primes report to the true, the mysterious aligns with the Emperor’s sincerity. The Supreme Micro Emperor ascends to the Three Clarities."*

The method of the **Supreme Prime Upper Radiance’s** awe-inspiring inner invocation belongs to the esoteric scriptures of the **Highest Clarity**. The *"Qian Toxin King"* is the hidden name of the great demon within the Six Heavens. The *"fluttering banner of Luo"* is the concealed title of the Demon King of the Northern Emperor. The *"towering Four Heavens"* are the soul-names of the ghostly ministers of the Northern Feng. One who knows the names of these three ghosts shall cause a thousand demons to flee without trace, ten thousand ghosts to conceal their forms, the Nine Demons to be powerless to test, and a hundred evils to be unable to inflict harm. Whether dwelling alone in mountains and forests or amidst the spirits of palaces and temples, one may proceed with confidence, without need to burn incense or enter the chamber. If fasting and entering the chamber, or at the morning and evening audiences of the Eight Primes, to subdue demons, summon spirits, and command divine perfected ones, one may wear the talisman and proceed.

The **Supreme Lord’s Divine Tiger Talisman**
The **Lord of the Supreme Micro Heavenly Emperor** addressed the **Upper Minister Azure Youth** and the **Queen Mother of the Western Citadel**, saying: *"The* **Highest Clarity Wisdom Scripture for Dispelling Demons** *is the jade tablet of the Supreme Ultimate, the true formula of the Most High. The* **Divine Tiger True Talisman** *is the treasured chapter of the Great Perfected Ones of the Nine Heavens. Wisdom can dispel filth, dispelling demons can restrain evil, and the true talisman can subdue demons and extinguish demons. Those who possess jade tablets with purple names and cultivate the supreme method shall not be assailed by the myriad demons or tested by the ten thousand demons. This may be called: no harm can intrude upon the divine might of the Divine Tiger, the wondrous efficacy of the true scripture. Now I entrust this to you, to transmit to later students who are destined to become true persons. Follow the statutes of the Supreme Perfected Ones: within seven hundred years, permit three transmissions. Do not show it to the unworthy, nor carelessly reveal the true scripture, lest one incur the punishment of the wind-blade."*

*"Those who delight in the true Dao, diligently focus their minds on the mysterious, do not begrudge wealth, and value the method above material goods—such is the Dao that abides within. Only to such persons may this be spoken. Those who inwardly covet treasures and outwardly indulge in frivolous desires—the Dao, though already illuminated, shall be sealed within a jade coffer, locked with a golden gate. After ascending and attaining transcendence, it shall be concealed within a famous mountain."*

---

The **Jade Capital of the Supreme Lord, the Nine Heavens’ Golden Clouds’ Awe-Inspiring Jade Invocation**, the **Supreme Prime Scripture of the Supreme Divine Tiger Talisman**.

The **large characters of the Divine Tiger** and the **invocation for wielding spirits** are stored by the Supreme Lord in the chamber of the **Primordial Beginning**, not transmitted to the world. Only those who are **supreme perfected ones** may behold them. According to the statutes of the **Supreme Ultimate’s esoteric methods**, on the day of ascension, one may transmit it to a single person; beyond that time, it may not be revealed again. The rites of transmission follow the preceding method.

Furthermore, when transmitting the scripture, the disciple shall hand-copy one copy for the master. After one hundred days, the master shall cast it into the eastern flowing waters, ensuring no one sees. This scripture is called *"Transcending the Human Dao"* and is a solemn covenant with the Three Officials.

**Oral Formula and Invocation Method for the Supreme Lord’s Divine Tiger Great Talisman**
When receiving the oral formula of the **Supreme Lord’s Jade Spirit Divine Tiger Great Talisman**, after completing the covenant and reception, the disciple shall cross their hands and draw a single line to present to the master. One hundred days after receiving the scripture, the master shall purify themselves for three days. The text drawn by the disciple, along with the covenant oaths and invocations, shall be sealed with an iron seal and cast into the deep waters of the Eastern Sea. They shall surely attain perfection and disperse all sorrows and sufferings. Do not divulge this! Ten thousand ages pass in an instant. Solemnly covenant with the Water Official, swiftly swear to the Earth Deity."*

After the invocation, return directly without looking back. This is called *"completing the covenant."* It is the beginning of having one’s name recorded in the register of the **Upper Official of the Three Officials**.

If, after receiving it, one does not act accordingly, they shall never be permitted to wear the **Divine Tiger Scripture** nor have their name inscribed in the **Highest Clarity**. After three years, their body shall perish, and they shall endure the long trials of the Water Official.

After the solemn covenant, on the **wu-shen** day of the **fourth month of each season**, use cinnabar to draw the talisman on white silk, making it three feet and two inches in length. Write the characters *"white king"* (bai wang), strike the teeth seven times, and recite the invocation:

*"The spirit of the Supreme Divine Tiger gathers qi into the purple script, containing the radiance of jade essence. Its might subdues fierce demons, restrains the ten thousand spirits. Divine youths attend and guard, Jade Maidens support the form. I wear this scripture and command golden soldiers, becoming a king of immortals, flying and ascending to the Highest Clarity."*

After reciting, strike the teeth seven more times and swallow saliva three times. On that day, use a **purple damask pouch** and a **white brocade pouch** to contain it and wear it on the body.

According to the statutes of the **Four Poles**, this talisman is weighty and may not be exposed to the world of mortals. Only those who already possess an **immortal name and jade tablet** may hear and see it. On the day of receiving the talisman, always inscribe it in cinnabar on white silk, rolling it to a size of one’s choosing and placing it in the pouch. If it has not been soiled or defiled, it may be worn on the body. In all matters, maintain secrecy, do not mix it with other scriptures, nor reveal its title.

chunks.original_text: 此太极之所禁，慎之哉。 太元上符神气精景，结生气神虎七头，常侍卫身，以伏灭邪魔，辟除不祥。 令神虎之后，不得语人，云我有天符，及宣说篇目。 若语一人一虎去，语二人则二虎、三虎、七虎却去，则兆形躯无复守卫之兵，於是邪魔恶鬼，及三官北帝，皆来试败。 若未得仙，深秘之。 四盟之科，慎之慎之。 保举 监度 度师 太上飞步空常箓 玉清部阶第二 维某号某年太岁某月日子，某州郡县乡里，男女生姓名，年若干岁，某月日时生，今赍仪信，诣三洞法师某君门下，由请受《太上飞步空常箓》，誓依奉修，不敢轻泄，唱露真文。 一旦违科，自受考责，万劫不原。 受持如法，生死俱仙，一如盟文律令。 太上大道君曰：空常者，天地之魂魄，阴阳之威明，空则九天之魂精，常乃九地之魄灵。 二气结中斗之中，为尊帝之大神，以威辅弼之焕明。 每以辅弼为瞻视，役运天光，察观万方，总箓天宿，回化五常，召运摄会，促机转神。 天休地泰，则空常隐藏，天否地激，则空常朗明，吉凶报应，立告不祥，变化万气，改易阴阳，四序代谢，莫不由之。 二星尊贵，隐伏华晨，得见二星，延寿无穷，存修其道，飞升上清。 宿有玉名玄图者，法得见其文。 受行之者，一月七过行之，六丁、八节之日，亦可入室烧香，左右敷置图席，南向叩齿二十四通，暝目存五星入兆五藏之宫，光洞一身，觉体兼热。 次思五星皇夫人，及二十五点空常晨君，姓讳服色各在其方。 都毕，而密祝曰： 金木水火土，总统四元，玄清流映，光照五门，中有五星灵君、夫人，二十五点空常太尊，变化形景，十合万分，降入五藏，结成玉仙，炼我七魄，育我三魂，举形上升，飞入斗门，遨戏上都，五星齐群，今日玄福，请如所陈。 毕，引五星光二十五咽止。 次行七步，并足，上太白星上，闭气七息，向西祝曰： 西方七门，白气飞光，上有皓帝，少阴明皇，讳金上精，衣服羽裳，艳彩流映，焕明金宫，号曰五点，空常之宗，带符仗节，召阴摄阳，变化水火，七十四方，使我飞步，隐景入空，驾乘白舆，翱翔云房，天地长年，永享无穷。 毕，仰咽七气止。 次行十二步，并足，上土星上，闭气十二息，向西南祝曰： 中皇四气，总监八灵，玉台紫房，神点化生，内有元皇，五常隐名，日步常门，安镇黄庭，衣带飞云，首冠华精，执符持节，焕落火铃，使我飞步，告我神名，下降脾腑，镇神安精，上天入云，藏景化形，隐变万物，遨游玉清，得与皇君，俱保太明。 毕，仰咽十二气止。 次行三步，上火星，向南三息，祝曰： 三门洞曜，丹光流精，玄气郁勃，焕映南溟，上有赤皇，五帝明灵，讳游光曜，锦衣文精，首戴宝冠，腰带玉铃，出入朱宫，紫房绛城，保录我命，南宫记生，使我飞步，变气藏形，日吉行道，普天肃清，心神结真，五魂洞明，齐光三炁，合景火星。 毕，仰咽三气止。 次行九步，上木星，向东九息，祝曰： 东方九炁，青天玉门，中有青晨，玄上之君，流精郁勃，是为天魂，讳大明焕，天地高尊，身衣凤衣，班文虎裙，化生五点，变景九都，头冠青精，横天玉冠，金符羽节，流铃纷纷，手执隐书，飞行羽文，总我命录，保我肝门，外映内曜，肝藏结仙，迎我高登，上朝帝晨。

Beware, for this is forbidden by the Great Ultimate—take heed! The primordial celestial talisman, the divine *qi*, the essence and radiance of the Most Supreme, coalesces into the **Seven-Headed Spirit Tiger of Vital *Qi***, ever attendant to guard the body, subdue and extinguish demonic forces, and dispel misfortune. The tiger’s retinue must never speak to others, saying, “I possess a celestial talisman,” nor disclose the title of this scripture. Should one speak to one person, one tiger departs; to two, two tigers leave; to three, three depart—until all seven tigers have gone, and the body is left without its guardian hosts. Then, malevolent spirits, demonic ghosts, the **Three Officials**, and the **Northern Emperor** will all come to test and assail. If one has not yet attained immortality, keep this deeply secret. By the statutes of the **Four Pacts**, take utmost care—take heed, take heed!

**Sponsor, Supervisor, Preceptor, and the Register of Soaring Steps in the Void of Perpetuity**—Second Rank of the Jade Clarity Department.

On the day of [year], in the reign of [Tai Sui], the [month] and [day], [hour], [so-and-so] of [prefecture, commandery, county, village], male/female, named [personal name], aged [years], born on the [month, day, hour], now presents offerings and tokens to the **Master of the Three Caverns**, [so-and-so], to request and receive the *Register of Soaring Steps in the Void of Perpetuity*. I vow to uphold and cultivate it without敢轻泄 or exposing its true text. Should I once violate these statutes, I shall bear the consequences of divine judgment, unforgiven for ten thousand kalpas. If received and maintained according to the proper method, I shall attain immortality in both life and death—all in accordance with the covenant and its decrees.

The **Most High Lord of the Great Dao** states: The Void and Perpetuity are the *hun* and *po* of Heaven and Earth, the majestic brilliance of *yin* and *yang*. The Void is the essence and spirit of the Nine Heavens, while Perpetuity is the numinous soul of the Nine Earths. The two *qi* converge at the center of the Dipper, forming the great deity of the Supreme Emperor, whose radiance aids and illuminates the cosmos. They regard the assisting deities as their gaze, dispatching the celestial light to survey all directions, recording the constellations of Heaven, revolving the Five Constants, summoning and gathering transformations, hastening the mechanisms of the divine. When Heaven is at peace and Earth is prosperous, the Void and Perpetuity remain concealed; when Heaven is in turmoil and Earth is disturbed, they shine forth in clarity. Fortune and misfortune, omens and warnings—all are instantly reported. They transform the myriad *qi*, alter *yin* and *yang*, and govern the succession of the four seasons—none occurs without their agency. The two stars are most revered, hidden within the splendor of dawn. Those who behold them gain boundless longevity; those who cultivate their Way ascend to the Highest Clarity. Only those whose names are inscribed in the **Jade Register of the Mysterious Chart** may lawfully behold this text. Practitioners shall perform this ritual seven times a month. On the days of the **Six Ding** and the **Eight Festivals**, one may enter the chamber, burn incense, and arrange the diagram and mat to the left and right. Facing south, strike the teeth twenty-four times, close the eyes, and visualize the Five Stars entering the five palaces of the viscera, their light penetrating the entire body until warmth is felt. Next, meditate upon the **Royal Ladies of the Five Stars** and the **Twenty-Five Luminaries of the Void and Perpetuity**, recalling their names, taboo names, and attire according to their respective directions. When all is complete, recite the secret invocation:

*"Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, Earth—governing the Four Origins,
Mysterious clarity flows and reflects, illuminating the Five Gates.
Within reside the Spirit Lords of the Five Stars and their Ladies,
The Twenty-Five Luminaries of the Void and Perpetuity, Most Exalted,
Transforming their forms and radiance, uniting ten thousand divisions.
Descend into the Five Viscera, coalescing into Jade Immortals,
Refining my seven *po*, nurturing my three *hun*,
Lifting my form to ascend, soaring into the Dipper’s Gate,
Roaming the Upper Capital, the Five Stars in assembly.
Today, I invoke this mysterious blessing—grant what I have recited."*

Afterward, draw in the light of the Five Stars and swallow twenty-five times. Then take seven steps, bring the feet together, and stand upon the **Star of Venus**. Hold the breath for seven breaths, facing west, and recite:

*"The Seven Gates of the West, white *qi* flying in radiance,
Above dwells the Luminous Emperor of Lesser *Yin*, the August Brilliance,
Whose taboo name is ‘Metal’s Supreme Essence,’
Clad in feathered robes, resplendent hues flowing,
Glowing bright in the Golden Palace,
Called the Five Luminaries, the lineage of the Void and Perpetuity.
Bearing talismans and wielding staffs, they summon *yin* and command *yang*,
Transforming water and fire across seventy-four directions.
Grant me the power to soar in flight, concealing my radiance in the Void,
Riding the white chariot, roaming the cloud chambers,
To enjoy eternal years, boundless and infinite."*

After reciting, swallow seven breaths while looking upward. Then take twelve steps, bring the feet together, and stand upon the **Star of Saturn**. Hold the breath for twelve breaths, facing southwest, and recite:

*"The Four *Qi* of the Central August, overseeing the Eight Numinous,
Within the Jade Terrace and Purple Chamber, divine luminaries transform and arise.
There dwells the Primordial August One, the Five Constants’ hidden name,
Who daily treads the Gate of Perpetuity, pacifying the Yellow Court.
Clad in robes of flying clouds, crowned with the essence of splendor,
Holding talismans and wielding staffs, adorned with fiery bells,
Grant me the power to soar in flight, reveal my divine name,
Descend into my spleen and viscera, pacify my spirit and essence,
Ascend to Heaven and enter the clouds, conceal my radiance and transform my form,
Hide and alter the myriad things, roam the Jade Clarity,
To dwell with the August Lord, together guarding the Great Brilliance."*

After reciting, swallow twelve breaths while looking upward. Then take three steps, stand upon the **Star of Mars**, face south, hold the breath for three breaths, and recite:

*"The Three Gates ablaze with radiance, cinnabar light flowing in essence,
Mysterious *qi* surging, glowing bright in the Southern Abyss.
Above dwells the Crimson August One, the luminous spirit of the Five Emperors,
Whose taboo name is ‘Wandering Radiance,’
Clad in brocade and patterned essence,
Crowned with a treasure diadem, girded with jade bells,
Moving in and out of the Vermilion Palace, the Purple Chamber and Crimson Walls.
Record and protect my life, inscribe my birth in the Southern Palace,
Grant me the power to soar in flight, transform my *qi* and conceal my form.
On auspicious days, practice the Way—may all under Heaven be purified.
My heart-spirit coalesces into truth, my five *hun* shine with clarity,
Aligned with the Three *Qi*, merging with the radiance of the Fire Star."*

After reciting, swallow three breaths while looking upward. Then take nine steps, stand upon the **Star of Jupiter**, face east, hold the breath for nine breaths, and recite:

*"The Nine *Qi* of the East, the Jade Gate of the Azure Heavens,
Within dwells the Azure Dawn, the Lord of the Mysterious Supreme,
Whose flowing essence surges—this is the celestial *hun*.
Whose taboo name is ‘Great Brightness,’ exalted above Heaven and Earth,
Clad in phoenix robes and striped tiger skirts,
Transforming into Five Luminaries, shifting forms across the Nine Capitals.
Crowned with the essence of azure, wearing the Jade Diadem of the Heavens,
Bearing golden talismans and feathered staffs, tinkling bells in abundance,
Holding the Hidden Script, soaring in flight with feathered texts.
Record my life, guard my Liver Gate,
Externally radiant, internally luminous—my liver stores the immortal.
Welcome my ascent, to ascend and pay homage to the Imperial Dawn."*

chunks.original_text: 毕，引星光九咽止。 次行五步，上木星，向北闭气五息，祝曰： 五气北玄，玄门洞灵，北辰流映，魁上玉清，中有太皇，五帝尊名，讳阴元液，衣服玄青，首冠玉冠，腰带流铃，金章玉节，翠佩焕明，徘徊华晨，傍观八冥，回津下降，入我肾庭，保录五神，藏府鲜荣，内外充溢，变景化形，骨飞肉升，上造玉清。 毕，引星光五咽止。 步五星毕，从水星却下行七步，登金星，立定并足，上第一九常，祝曰： 九常地君，变景幽冥，为我隐步，以逃我形。 毕，次上第二育常，祝曰： 育常灵君，形无常服，为我变化，身为草木。 毕，次上第三卯常，祝曰： 卯常尊神，能沈能升，为身化景，变成丘陵。 毕，次上第四流常，祝曰： 流常皇君，形无恒身，为我吐吸，兴气起烟。 毕，次上第五行常，祝曰： 行常大君，威伏万鬼，变化我形，起烟成火。 毕。 五常祝毕，还金星，闭气七息，祝曰： 飞空太幽，化景五常，北入五气，南制三阳，金符命灵，太帝扶将，六戊逃己，保度洞乡，太白护肺，金镇胃肠，内充外溢，形魂俱翔，千变万化，适意所行，得与玉皇，同游上景。 毕，引炁七咽止。 次从金星十二步，登土星了，并足，上第一上常，祝曰： 上常翔翔，变化亿千，为我藏景，升入九天。 毕，次上第二天常，祝曰： 天常流炎，起烟成垒，为我化形，带神入火。 毕，次上第三名常，祝曰： 名常北玄，以水为身，隐我河海，灌我成真。 毕，次上第四三常，祝曰： 三常变威，光制八庭，为我致仙，却灾攘兵。 毕，次上第五辰常，祝曰： 辰常万化，体无常形，为我致仙，逃死入生。 毕。 步五常毕，还土星上，闭气十二息，祝曰： 无常五黄，中皇大神，变气七金，威伏三辰，化身分形，上天入云，总呼五灵，卫我脾门，使我藏腑，早化成仙，飞常入空，水火万原，在所恣意，上升无门，得与玉妃，结友齐群。 毕，引炁十二咽止。 次从土星三步，登火星了，并足，上第一空常，祝曰： 空常至灵，辅弼上真，入我绛宫，总摄万灵。 毕，次上第二河常，祝曰： 河常兆伏，隐遁八冥，水火变化，使我成仙。 毕，次上第三元常，祝曰： 元常变化，草木蔽身，使我形景，同合道真。 毕，次上第四古常，祝曰： 古常天双，出入无间，身生羽翼，飞升上天。 毕，次上第五巳常，祝曰： 巳常南离，立自九覆，变化我形，立成鸟兽。 毕。 步五常毕，还火星，闭气三息，祝曰： 流炎丹灵，三门电霆，五常通变，万化郁冥，摄命玉皇，威制北精，上元仙箓，保我长生，今日步空，乘虚入星，荧惑辅心，我道同明，千分万合，所向立成，魂导魄炼，羽服时生，得与五星，携舆玉清。 毕，咽三气止。 次从火星九步，登木星了，并足，上第一九常，祝曰： 九常青皇，天地魂根，使我变化，逃景隐山。 毕，次上第二世常，祝曰： 世常天灵，总度万仙，使我步空，合景成神。 毕，次上第三明常，祝曰： 明常昭昭，光耀八涎，使我变形，逃水隐源。 毕，次上第四玉常，祝曰： 玉常威化，制制五土，使我化形，立住成虎。 毕，次上第五法常，祝曰： 法常部木，位总神仙，使我分景，化身为千。 毕。 步五常毕，还木星上，闭气九息，祝曰： 少阳九门，徘徊青天，中有五常，变化亿千，呼阴召阳，制制金神，东华命节，坐应自然，步空蹑虚，策驾青烟，上镇碧虚，下镇肝门，道明九合，立致飞仙，得为青皇，同真木晨。

Upon completion, draw in the starlight and swallow nine times to conclude.

*"The Five *Qi* of the North, the Mysterious Gate of the Profound,
The Northern Asterism flows in radiance, the Supreme Jade Clarity of the *Kui* Constellation,
Within dwells the Grand Sovereign, the Five Emperors’ exalted names,

Clad in robes of darkest azure, crowned with the Jade Diadem,
Girded with belts of tinkling bells,
Bearing golden talismans and jade staffs, jade pendants gleaming bright,
Wandering the resplendent dawn, gazing beside the Eight Obscurities,
Descending in revolving streams to enter my Kidney Court,
Preserving and recording the Five Spirits, my viscera flourishing in brilliance,
Internally and externally replete, transforming my radiance and altering my form,
My bones take flight, my flesh ascends—
I ascend to the Jade Clarity."*

Upon completion, draw in the starlight and swallow five times to conclude.

After pacing the Five Stars, retreat seven steps from the Water Star, ascend to the Metal Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Nine Constants:

*"Nine Constants, Earth Lords, transform the shadows of the hidden depths,

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the Nurturing Constant, and recite:

*"Nurturing Constant, Spirit Lord, whose form knows no fixed attire,
Transform me, that my body may become grass or wood."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the *Mao* Constant, and recite:

*"*Mao* Constant, Exalted Spirit, who sinks and rises,
Transform my body into radiance, alter me into hills and mounds."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Flowing Constant, and recite:

*"Flowing Constant, August Lord, whose form knows no permanence,
For me, exhale and inhale, stir the *qi* and raise the mist."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the Moving Constant, and recite:

*"Moving Constant, Great Lord, whose might subdues the myriad ghosts,
Transform my form, raise mist to become flame."*

Upon completion of the Five Constants’ invocations, return to the Metal Star, hold the breath for seven cycles, and recite:

*"Soaring through the Great Obscurity, transforming radiance into Five Constants,
Entering the Five *Qi* of the North, subduing the Three Yangs of the South,
Golden talismans command the spirits, the Supreme Emperor lends his aid,
The Six *Wu* escape the Six *Ji*, preserving passage through the Cavern Realms,
The Great White guards the lungs, metal stabilizes the stomach and intestines,
Internally replete, externally overflowing, form and *hun* take flight together,
A thousand transformations, ten thousand changes—wherever my will directs,
I attain union with the Jade Emperor, roaming the Supreme Radiance."*

Upon completion, draw in the *qi* and swallow seven times to conclude.

Next, from the Metal Star, take twelve steps to ascend the Earth Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Upper Constants:

*"Upper Constant, soaring and circling, transforming in countless millions,
Conceal my radiance for me, that I may ascend into the Nine Heavens."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the Heavenly Constant, and recite:

*"Heavenly Constant, flowing flames, raising mist to form ramparts,
Transform my form for me, gird my spirit and enter the fire."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the Named Constant, and recite:

*"Named Constant of the Northern Mystery, whose body is water,
Hide me in rivers and seas, bathe me to perfection."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Three Constants, and recite:

*"Three Constants, transforming might, illuminating the Eight Courts,
For me, attain immortality, repel disasters and ward off weapons."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the *Chen* Constant, and recite:

*"*Chen* Constant of ten thousand transformations, whose body knows no fixed form,
For me, attain immortality, escape death and enter life."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Earth Star, hold the breath for twelve cycles, and recite:

*"The Five Yellows without constancy, the Central August Great Spirit,
Transform the *qi* of the Seven Metals, whose might subdues the Three Luminaries,
My body divides into forms, ascending to heaven and entering the clouds,
Summoning the Five Spirits in unison to guard my Spleen Gate,
That my viscera may swiftly transform into immortality,
Soaring through the Constants into the void, traversing water and fire across the myriad origins,
Wherever my will directs, ascending without barrier,
I attain union with the Jade Consort, befriending the host of immortals."*

Upon completion, draw in the *qi* and swallow twelve times to conclude.

Next, from the Earth Star, take three steps to ascend the Fire Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Void Constants:

*"Void Constant, most numinous, assisting the Supreme Perfected,
Enter my Crimson Palace, gathering and governing the myriad spirits."*

Upon completion, ascend to the second, the River Constant, and recite:

*"River Constant, presaging submission, concealed in the Eight Obscurities,
Transforming through water and fire, that I may attain immortality."*

Upon completion, ascend to the third, the Primordial Constant, and recite:

*"Primordial Constant, transforming and altering, concealing my body in grass and trees,
That my form and radiance may unite with the true Dao."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fourth, the Ancient Constant, and recite:

*"Ancient Constant of Heaven’s Pair, entering and exiting without hindrance,
My body sprouts feathered wings, soaring to ascend the heavens."*

Upon completion, ascend to the fifth, the *Si* Constant, and recite:

*"*Si* Constant of the Southern *Li*, standing amidst the Nine Overturnings,
Transform my form, that I may instantly become bird or beast."*

Upon completion of pacing the Five Constants, return to the Fire Star, hold the breath for three cycles, and recite:

*"Flowing flames and cinnabar spirits, lightning and thunder at the Three Gates,
The Five Constants interpenetrate and transform, the myriad changes shrouded in obscurity,
Seizing the life-record of the Jade Emperor, whose might subdues the Northern Essence,
The Upper Register of Immortals preserves my longevity,
Today I pace the void, riding emptiness to enter the stars,
The Sparkling Deluder aids my heart, my Dao shines in unison,
A thousand divisions, ten thousand unions—wherever I direct, instant attainment,
My *hun* guides, my *po* is refined, feathered robes timely manifest,
I attain union with the Five Stars, riding in company to the Jade Clarity."*

Upon completion, swallow three cycles of *qi* to conclude.

Next, from the Fire Star, take nine steps to ascend the Wood Star, stand with feet together, and recite the first of the Nine Constants:

chunks.original_text: 弼星在斗第三星之内，斗口之中，弼真人之府，为隐元之星。 凡九步斗，当避真人星，不可蹑，皆从第二星越过，取第四星。 今此空常之法，不步真人，但步辅弼，既步辅星毕，即回就弼星，步弼星存祝毕，即空常之道一周矣。 祝曰： 上尊上宫，夫人右皇，帝尊同符，合灵华房，天魂地魄，号曰上空，变化九炁，万真祖宗，回金转石，与天齐功，化消山河，呼制云龙，万怪立应，分景亿通，飞步蹑虚，流焕回冲，藏身魁席，覆衣天光，长灵天地，享福洋洋，请如所愿，寿祚无穷。 毕，叩齿咽气三十六过，空常之道毕矣。 行之七年，分形九空，十四年飞行太虚，细存谛亲，具在经中。 朱书白素上，锦囊盛，飞步之时佩於首，登星时亦须存呼此三字也。 顺行步星法 向阳明大魁顺行，至右足蹑天关，进左足与并，息通，乃微祝曰： 金木水火土，五行相推，七星焕焕，天纲最威，辅星镇盛，弼星却衰，九真太上，太极太微，三府玉帝，三尊辟非，天动地转，魂魄相随，使我飞仙，真光徘徊，名入金房，玉关乃开，乘龙陟空，日月同晖，游行上清，鸣铃翠衣，左摄流电，右御奔雷，地上万邪，伏死敢追，恶心向我，使尔斩摧，帝命玉女，营侍以归，魂真魄神，合形升飞。 倒行法 止於天关，向北极，乃於天关上闭气握固，至右足蹑阴精，左足蹑阳明前，右足与左足蹑并，乃右回天枢，微祝曰： 天魁正阳，斗运低昂，前转元机，后动灵纲，制魄以宁，拘魂以康，魂魄与身，俱行天堂，向见金门，高上太皇，左扶仙母，右扶仙公，紫翠飞华，龙袍虎裳，带真巾玉，项生圆光，手把神铃，腰佩金珰，口咏洞真，七变妙章，先自虚无，生而仙王，飞行九道，据斗攀纲，前从太一，后从玄郎，告某口诀，坐在立亡，反行至要，位为仙卿，五藏自生，与自相迎，所愿皆合，所求克昌，万邪亿害，易地隐藏。 毕。 反行法 又闭气，右回斗星之外三匝，始於阳明步魂，於阳明右回身，左足上天枢，右并，乃闭气握固，左足上瑶光，右足上闱阳，以次后两足俱上阳明，回身向玄冥，右手抚心，以左手指玄冥，闭气三息，叩齿三七通，咽液三九过，祝曰： 肠明紫炁，太素玄辰，金关黄房，中有大神，左抚上皇，右把高真，龙衔翠衣，飞锦虎文，腰带玉符，首戴莲冠，出无入虚，金真玉光，灵尊巍峨，号曰肠明，足蹑朱烟，口咏洞章，赐某隐书，见教步纲，周行三复，据斗息忘，使某飞仙，超虚浮空，名书上清，乘玄驾龙，意有所知，愿乐皆从，三尊合德，魂魄内通，致给神宫，玉女玉童，毕。 攀魁法 两足俱上阴精星，以左手抚心，右手指真人星，闭气三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，微祝曰： 阴精玄素，华阙生门，中有玉帝，北极至尊，凤绣华领，龙翠碧裙，腰佩虎铃，扶芝丹冠，号曰阴精，太上之君，授某隐书，使步七元，攀魁上斗，遂游灵关，外拘七魄，内制三魂，魄练俗累，魂宝胎神，魂魄守身，与之俱仙，飞行上清，还气婴颜，所向如心，万欲无难。 毕。 接真法 两足俱上弼星，先左足，勿随其纲，仍转身向真人星，心存而拜，开膝夹弼，手捬心，闭气四息，叩齿四通，咽液四过，咒曰：脚虽右弼，存咒乃在真人星。

The Star of Assistance resides within the third star of the Dipper, at the Dipper’s mouth, serving as the abode of the Perfected One of Assistance and the star of Hidden Primordiality. the seven stars gleam resplendent,

the Great Ultimate and Radiant Tenuity,
the Three Palaces and Jade Emperors,

soul and spirit follow in unison.

true light lingering and circling,
my name inscribed in the Golden Chamber,
the Jade Pass now open.
Riding the dragon to ascend the void,
sun and moon shine together,
roaming the Upper Clarity,
jingling bells and emerald robes,
seizing lightning on the left,
commanding thunder on the right.
All earthly evils,
prostrate and dead, dare not pursue.
If wicked intent turns toward me,
may it be severed and crushed.
By imperial decree, Jade Maidens

Soul, spirit, and body united,

the Supreme August One on high,
the Immortal Mother on the left,
the Immortal Lord on the right,
purple and emerald flying blossoms,
dragon robes and tiger garments,
adorned with the true sash and jade,
a halo crowning the head,
holding divine bells in hand,
golden pendants at the waist,
chanting the *Dongzhen* scriptures,
the sevenfold wondrous verses.

then becoming an immortal king,
soaring through the nine paths,
grasping the Dipper and climbing the net.
Advancing with the Great One,
retreating with the Mysterious Lord,
receiving the oral transmission,
sitting in death and standing in oblivion.
The essential retrograde method
elevates one to the rank of immortal minister.
The five viscera regenerate,
welcoming one another of their own accord.
All wishes are fulfilled,
all pursuits prosper.
Myriad evils and countless harms

within dwells the Great Spirit,
left hand supporting the Supreme August One,
right hand grasping the Lofty Perfected,
dragon mouth holding emerald robes,
flying brocade with tiger patterns,
jade talismans at the waist,
lotus crown upon the head.
Emerging from nothingness, entering the void,
golden perfection and jade radiance,
the numinous and venerable one,
named Intestine Brightness,
feet treading crimson mist,
mouth chanting the *Dongzhang* scriptures.
Bestowing upon me the hidden texts,
teaching the pacing of the celestial net,
circling thrice in repetition,
grasping the Dipper and forgetting breath.
Grant that I ascend as a flying immortal,
soaring through the void,
my name inscribed in the Upper Clarity,
riding the dark dragon’s chariot.
Whatever the mind knows,
whatever the heart desires,
all shall be fulfilled.
The Three Venerables unite in virtue,
soul and spirit commune within,
arriving at the divine palace,
Jade Maidens and Jade Lads attend."*

**Method for Grasping the Dipper’s Handle**
Step with both feet onto the Yin Essence star, place the left hand over the heart, and point with the right hand toward the Perfected One’s star. Hold the breath for three breaths, knock the teeth three times, and swallow saliva three times. Softly recite:

phoenix-embroidered collar,
dragon-emerald skirt,
tiger bells at the waist,
red mushroom crown upon the head,
named Yin Essence,
the Supreme One’s Lord.
Bestowing upon me the hidden texts,
teaching the pacing of the seven origins,
grasping the Dipper’s handle to ascend,
roaming the numinous passes.
Externally restraining the seven spirits,
internally governing the three souls.
Refining the spirit to shed worldly burdens,
treasuring the soul as the womb’s spirit.
Soul and spirit guard the body,
ascending as immortals together.
Soaring through the Upper Clarity,
returning qi to rejuvenate the countenance.
All intentions fulfilled,
ten thousand desires without difficulty."*

**Method for Receiving the Perfected**
Step with both feet onto the Star of Support, the left foot first, without following its celestial net. Turn the body to face the Perfected One’s star, visualize and bow. Kneel with knees flanking the Star of Support, hands over the heart. Hold the breath for four breaths, knock the teeth four times, and swallow saliva four times. chunks.original_text: 两足俱上北极星，左足先，右足并，以右手抚心，左手指天关星，闭气三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，祝曰： 上玄太微，北极紫盖，下有太真，游翔无外，翠华飞裙，金铃青带，腰佩玉光，玄灵庵蔼，赐某隐书，上行七气，登清越烟，真人合会，乞得飞仙，书名丹室，所向所愿，无灾无害。 毕。 乘龙法 两足俱上天关星，左先右并，顺纲外，右手抚心，左手指天关星，闭炁三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，祝曰： 太上北极，紫微绝辰，宝玄金房，外有玉门，周运九宫，调和天关，中有尊神，号曰紫皇，授某隐书，携其乘龙，上浮九天，下飞地元，景云丹舆，玄华翠裳，腰佩龙策，头巾虎文，包生万物，教训飞仙，脱某死名，天地长存，乘龙步斗，所向受恩。 毕。 仍闭气，存龙舆朱盖，扶天来迎，恍惚登天，忘形良久，乃转上辅星，游行三界，两足俱上辅星，左回，先左足，随纲绕北极，而蹑辅星，右足来并，乃向北极，两手抚心，闭气一息，叩齿三通，咽液一过，仰首视星，咒曰： 太极辅星，精在紫关，养生育命，宝守神魂，金房再开，奉见辅星，赐某隐书，使某游旋，列名圣皇，飞仙九天，巾光佩真，出入洞门。 毕。 上辅星之中，拜见道君，恍惚忘形，良久乃转上弼，徘徊三阳，回行诣弼星，两足俱上，先左足，直历诸星边，浮空上弼，右足并合，向真人星，两手抚心，闭气一息，叩齿三通，咽液一过，祝曰： 太虚泥丸，紫宫天尊，玄空真纽，为帝之先，在道玉皇，在身泥丸，冯感欻生，炁贯三元，精入明堂，强胎益魂，朱山再开，奉见灵元，左采日华，右掇月根，流火万里，金罗碧裙，腰带虎符，首戴华冠，赐某隐书，得行天关，乞愿飞仙，役使万神，万向皆会，福德如山。 毕。 存在天上弼星之中，拜请玉皇，乞速得飞仙。 若值朝极日，仍下入魁朝之，下者左转，右足上天枢，左行步三台五星也。 朝极日 凡步纲蹑纪，皆用此日，并甲子、八节日也。 春正月一日、二月二十日、三月二十七日、夏四月八日、五月五日、六月十八日、秋七月七日、八月二十日、九月九日、冬十月五日、十一月三日、十二月六日。 凡修行飞步蹑纲行星者，皆用此日，一依前法用之。 行之十四年，七星精下化成神人，并乘流铃八景丹玄斑云，俱来诣子，拜子仙官，白日飞龙。 一年辟非灾，二年辟兵，三年辟死，四年地仙，千害万邪，众莫敢干，自此以后，福庆无端，致使神灵，骖驾飞龙，太极赐芝，玉帝给童。 行之二七年，为上清真人也。 保举

**Method for Treading the Celestial Net (Continued)**

Both feet ascend together to the North Star. The left foot leads, the right follows. With the right hand resting upon the heart and the left hand pointing to the Celestial Pivot Star, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth three times, and swallow saliva thrice. Recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Mystery of the Great Tenuity,
Purple Canopy of the North Star,
Beneath lies the Great Perfected,
Soaring boundlessly beyond.
Jade skirts in flight,
Golden bells and azure sashes,

Mystic numina in misty array—

That I may ascend the Seven Qi,
Mount the clear and distant mists,
Meet with the Perfected,
And entreat flight as an immortal.
Inscribe my name in the Cinnabar Chamber.
Wherever I turn, wherever I seek,
No calamity, no harm shall befall me."*

**End.**

**Method for Mounting the Dragon**
Both feet ascend together to the Celestial Pivot Star. The left leads, the right follows, moving along the Net’s outer path. With the right hand resting upon the heart and the left hand pointing to the Celestial Pivot Star, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth three times, and swallow saliva thrice. Recite the incantation:

*"Supreme North Star,
Purple Tenuity beyond the stars,
Precious Mystery of the Golden Chamber,
Without lies the Jade Gate.
Revolving through the Nine Palaces,
Harmonizing the Celestial Pivot—
Within dwells the Honored Divinity,
Named the Purple Sovereign.
Grant me the Hidden Scriptures,
That I may ride the dragon,
Ascend the Nine Heavens,
Descend to the Earth’s Origin.
A chariot of luminous clouds,
A robe of dark splendor and jade hues,
A dragon-whip at the waist,
A tiger-patterned headscarf.
Embracing the myriad beings,
Instructing the flying immortals—
Release me from the name of death,
That I may endure with heaven and earth.
Mounting the dragon, treading the Dipper,
Wherever I turn, grace shall attend me."*

*"Supreme Ultimate’s Auxiliary Star,
Essence dwelling in the Purple Pass,
Nurturing life, fostering destiny,
Precious guardian of spirit and soul.
The Golden Chamber opens again,
That I may behold the Auxiliary Star.
Bestow upon me the Hidden Scriptures,
That I may wander and revolve.
Inscribe my name among the Sage Emperors,
A flying immortal of the Nine Heavens.
A radiant headscarf, a girdle of truth,
Entering and exiting the Grotto Gate."*

**End.**

Within the Auxiliary Star, bow to the Dao Lord. In a trance, forget the body for a long while, then turn to ascend the Aligning Star. Wander the Three Yangs, then proceed to the Aligning Star. Both feet ascend together, the left foot leading, passing directly by each star until floating above the Aligning Star in the void. The right foot joins. Face the Perfected Star, both hands resting upon the heart. Hold the breath for one cycle, knock the teeth three times, and swallow saliva once. Recite the incantation:

*"Great Void’s Mud-Pill Palace,
Purple Palace’s Heavenly Honored,
Mystic Void’s True Pivot,
Foremost of the Emperor—
In the Dao, the Jade Sovereign;
In the body, the Mud-Pill.
Swift as a sudden inspiration,
Qi pierces the Three Origins.
Essence enters the Hall of Light,
Strengthening the womb, enriching the soul.
The Crimson Mountain opens again,
That I may behold the Numinous Origin.
Gather the sun’s splendor on the left,
Pluck the moon’s root on the right.
Flaming fire streams ten thousand leagues,
A golden net and azure skirt.
A tiger-tally at the waist,
A flowered crown upon the head.
Bestow upon me the Hidden Scriptures,
That I may traverse the Celestial Pivot.
Entreat flight as an immortal,
Commanding the myriad spirits.
Wherever I turn, all shall converge,
Virtue and fortune like mountains."*

**End.**

Abide within the Aligning Star in the heavens, bowing to the Jade Sovereign and entreating swift ascent as a flying immortal.

**On the Day of Audience with the Pole**
If it coincides with the day of audience with the Pole, descend to pay homage to the Dipper. In descending, turn left. The right foot ascends to the Celestial Pivot, then proceed leftward to tread the Three Terraces and Five Stars.

**Days of Audience with the Pole**

- In two years, you avert warfare.
